body: Last commenter is right. This isnt harem. How hard is that for people to get? I don't even mind the work, but people seek out works based on their tastes. No ugly bastard/dilf tag but it is tagged harem, is retarded tagging. At least the dumbshit didn't mistag "sole male" which I advise you harem enjoyers to use to filter out trash tagging like this (and to avoid people tagging ntr stuff harem too). Also, MC basically gets his mentor/colleague taken away from him (neither fatass or her to be seen), so kinda low key ntr-ish.

This WOULD'VE been good were it not for the fat fuck. Like, I don't expect them to be all virgins, but even a harem is worthless if it consists of an ugly bastard's second hand goods, especially if he's still actively in the picture. Too bad because everything else was awesome. Harem, ahegao, girls being fucked into submission... but nope. IMO, harem is mostly good when it's special, not when everyone in that world has one, or worse, when the girls don't even belong to MC's harem and are coincidentally fucking him while they're getting clapped anywhere else. Man, I swear my neck and my beard grew a whole 30 cm's, but I just can't. Porn is the one place where I want my wants pandered xD
FINALLY THIS IS GETTING TRANSLATED AHHHH
Look up #403103, then you'll know this is trash
I'm probably one of the few people to think this but I don't like orgys it is a lot to keep up with
Ugly bastard is an insta no anywhere in it... Eww
